data.name: Riverbed APM User Conference Vol. 2
data.location: Microsoft Technology Centers, 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston, VA
data.description: Our second peer-driven technical user conference event for the SteelCentral AppInternals and Aternity community will be held on August 29-30 in Washington, DC. Save the date!

relatedRecords.name: Monitorama Baltimore
relatedRecords.description: We’re very excited to bring Monitorama back to the east coast for a new event in the great city of Baltimore. Many of you were with us for our original Boston event back in 2013, and have been asking us ever since to bring it back east again. It took a while, but we’ve finally found a venue in Balti…

relatedRecords.name: #PerfMatters Conference
relatedRecords.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.
